speaker: President.
english:
President. The next item is the report by Bastiaan Belder, on behalf of the Committee on Foreign Affairs, on EU-China relations ( 2005/2161 (INI) ) ( A6-0257/2006 ).
I have received a request from the Socialist Group in the European Parliament, pursuant to Rule 168 of the Rules of Procedure, to refer the report by Mr Belder on EU-China relations back to committee. Does anybody wish to move this request by the Socialist Group in the European Parliament?
original:
President. The next item is the report by Bastiaan Belder, on behalf of the Committee on Foreign Affairs, on EU-China relations ( 2005/2161 (INI) ) ( A6-0257/2006 ).
I have received a request from the Socialist Group in the European Parliament, pursuant to Rule 168 of the Rules of Procedure, to refer the report by Mr Belder on EU-China relations back to committee. Does anybody wish to move this request by the Socialist Group in the European Parliament?
